explanation: [0-0] In an indoor setting, a girl in a purple and white anime costume, wearing tech-punk glasses and a white mask, sits on the floor with her legs straight out. To her left, a person in a black T-shirt and jeans bends down and extends their right hand toward her, holding a white plastic cup. A glass door with a black frame is visible on the upper right.

[0-2] First, the person in the black T-shirt squats down. The camera zooms in as they pour the white liquid from the plastic cup onto the floor between the girl's legs. Three red question marks appear next to them.

[0-2] First, the person in the black T-shirt squats down. The camera zooms in as they pour the white liquid from the plastic cup onto the floor between the girl's legs. Three red question marks appear next to them.

[2-6] The camera then zooms out, and the three red question marks disappear. The person in the black T-shirt points at the white liquid on the floor with their right index finger. They hold a rag and a 100 yuan bill in their left hand, then use their right hand to pick up the bill and wave it around. Changing Chinese subtitles appear in the center, reading "Whoever cleans the milk first", "This 100 yuan", "Belongs to them!". The camera cuts to the girl, who nods her head, and the Chinese subtitle "Okay!" appears.
